about_the_game:
The vast world of Daikonia is being invaded by monsters and you have been asked to help to protect the local daikon crops. Harvest, grow stronger, unlock secrets, overcome challenges and survive in this fast pacing roguelike.

Upgrades


After leveling up or opening a chest you will be able to choose between random upgrades and relics that after being selected unlock new upgrades/relics. The combinations are endless. Try to figure out the best combos and discover unique playstyles.

Elements


Elements add a new layer of strategy for your builds. Each of yours Creatures has one Element with its own list of effects and that can be unlocked at the run by various methods (leveling up, opening chests, defeating certain enemies and more). Each Enemy can be weak, neutral or strong against each Element. At start of the Early Access there'll be 5 avaliable Elements: Water, Nature, Fire, Dark and Light. Here are some examples of effects that you can trigger with Element Nature: it can root and damage enemies, restore your health, improve your Harvesting.

Features

  • Start by selecting your character and stage
  • EachCharacter has unique stats, passive and starts with a thematic Daikon Creature
  • Daikon Creatures will help you to take care of the Enemies, each has unique attacks and evolution trees
  • Level up Upgrades improve your base stats as well unlock new Upgrades and Relics
  • Each Daikon Creature has an Element that have various effects and can be upgradaeble with the Element Mastery
  • Relics add special effects for your Character, Daikon Creatures, the World, to the Enemies, and so on
  • After choosing a Relic it can unlock new Upgrades and Relics
  • At the World there are strange Structures that give you Challenges and Rewards
  • Unlock new Characters by exploring or at the Shop

Can you survive?

short_description: Fight hordes of monsters in this survival roguelite as you explore each level with unique challenges, secrets and relics, using up to 6 creatures by your side. Harvest, upgrade and survive.
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
